nokey.language.free_dictionary module

class nokey.language.free_dictionary.FreeDictionary[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the Free Dictionary API.

Attributes: - base_url: The base URL of the Free Dictionary API. - about: A short description of the API.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns the URL for the Free Dictionary API documentation.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: The URL for thre API documentation.

look_up_word(word)[source]

Returns the definition and other information of a word.

Args: - word (str): The word to be looked up.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing the definition of a word and other related information.
